physical_appearance: The image displays the front cover of a book. It is grey in colour and all the words on it are black in colour. The title of the book, 'The Port of Singapore', is displayed from the top left hand side of the book. 'G.W.A. Trimmer' is listed as the author and also the 'Chairman & General Manager, Harbour Boards, Straits Settlements' are stated. The year '1933' is stated at the bottom centre of the book. There are two vertical lines that are made up of short horizontal dashes at the left hand side of the book cover.
sgcool_label_text:
This is an extremely rare book by G.W.A. Trimmer, Chairman and General manager of Harbour Boards, Straits Settlements. It was published in 1933. The book contains a beautifully coloured map of Singapore. 

Mr Trimmer came to Singapore in 1910 and was a significant figure in the development of Singapore's port facilities and trading activities.
title_text: The Port of Singapore The Port of Singapore by G.W.A. Trimmer
subject_terms_2: Rare books Non-fiction. . . Singapore Harbour Board Straits Settlements Harbours
techniques_name: colour printing bookbinding (process) book cloth (textile material)
